Package com.appglu

The main package of AppGlu's Java Client SDK.
Contain interfaces to describe all available operations and APIs as well as model objects to be used by these operations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AnalyticsOperations AnalyticsOperations is used to upload events to AppGlu allowing it to collect mobile app usage statistics.
AppGluOperations Interface that describes all the APIs available on AppGlu.
AsyncAnalyticsOperations AsyncAnalyticsOperations has all methods that AnalyticsOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncAppGluOperations Interface that describes all the asynchronous APIs available on AppGlu.
AsyncCrudOperations AsyncCrudOperations has all methods that CrudOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncPushOperations AsyncPushOperations has all methods that PushOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncSavedQueriesOperations AsyncSavedQueriesOperations has all methods that SavedQueriesOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncStorageOperations AsyncStorageOperations has all methods that StorageOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncSyncOperations AsyncSyncOperations has all methods that SyncOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
AsyncUserOperations AsyncUserOperations has all methods that UserOperations has but they execute asynchronously.
CrudOperations CrudOperations contains create, read, update and delete operations to be applied on your tables.
InputStreamCallback A callback to have direct access over the InputStream.
Usually used when downloading a large file or JSON.
PushOperations PushOperations is used to register / unregister the device making it eligible to receive push notifications.
RowMapper<T> Maps a Row of the database to another object.
SavedQueriesOperations SavedQueriesOperations allow you to run your previously created SQLs on AppGlu and obtain the results.
StorageOperations StorageOperations has methods to download and cache files from AppGlu server.
SyncOperations SyncOperations is used to synchronize the data in your local SQLite tables with the AppGlu server.
TableChangesCallback This callback will receive events while a JSON input stream is being parsed.
This JSON is the response of the Sync Changes API, containing all rows changed since the last time sync executed.
UserOperations UserOperations has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users.
UserOperations depends on a implementation of UserSessionPersistence to keep track of the current logged in User.
UserSessionPersistence Strategy for keeping track of the authenticated mobile application User.
When UserOperations.signup(User) or UserOperations.login(String, String) are called the User will be saved using UserSessionPersistence.saveAuthenticatedUser(User).
When UserOperations.logout() is called then the User will be removed using UserSessionPersistence.logout().
 

Class Summary
AnalyticsSession Represents a session of application usage.
AnalyticsSessionEvent Represents an event that happened during the usage of the app.
AsyncCallback<Result> Define methods to be called as a callback while doing an asynchronous operation.
AsyncCallback is used in every asynchronous method of the SDK.
AuthenticationResult Contains the result of a mobile application user sign up or log in.
If succeed is false then error will be not null.
Device Represents a unique device installation for the purpose of receiving push notifications.
Error An Error object has a code and a message.
ErrorResponse An error response contains an Error object.
ExceptionWrapper If an asynchronous method throws an exception, that exception is wrapped with ExceptionWrapper to provide a easy way of extracting error code and error messages.
QueryParams Represents the names and values of parameters to be replaced before a query is executed.
QueryResult Represents the result of a executed query.
A select query will return a list of rows, use QueryResult.getRows() to get it.
A insert, update or delete query will return the quantity of rows affected, use QueryResult.getRowsAffected() to get it.
ReadAllFilterArguments Used to specify filters to be applied when retrieving rows from the server.
Row Represents a row in the database.
RowChanges RowChanges contains the SyncOperation to be applied for this Row.
If the operation is SyncOperation.INSERT or SyncOperation.UPDATE then RowChanges.getRow() will contain the data to be used for that insert or update.
Rows Contains a list of Row objects and the total number of rows that table has.
StorageFile Represents a file.
StorageFileRowMapper Maps a Row of the database to StorageFile object.
TableChanges Contains all the delta changes of a particular table.
TableVersion A table and it's version.
User Represents a mobile application user.
When the User is authenticated, this object will be saved using a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 

Enum Summary
DevicePlatform Represents the operating system of the device.
ErrorCode A code identifying the error the server has returned.
SortDirection The sort direction can be SortDirection.ASC or SortDirection.DESC.
SyncOperation Represents the operation that will be executed on a single row of the SQLite database while synchronizing data.
 

Exception Summary
AppGluHttpClientException Happens when an HTTP status error of the client series is received (anything between 400 and 499).
AppGluHttpInternalServerErrorException Represents an HTTP status error code of 500 (Generic Server Error).
AppGluHttpInvalidUserSignupException Happens when UserOperations.signup(User) does not succeed.
That can be because the user already existed or maybe the password is weak.
AppGluHttpNotFoundException Happens when the HTTP status error 400 is received.
AppGluHttpServerException Happens when an HTTP status error of the server series is received (anything between 500 and 599).
AppGluHttpStatusCodeException Happens when an HTTP status error of the client or server series is received (anything between 400-499 or 500-599).
AppGluHttpUserUnauthorizedException Happens when UserOperations.login(String, String) does not succeed because either the login or the password does not match.
AppGluRestClientException The base exception for any exception that can be thrown by the Java AppGlu client.
RowMapperException Exception that can happen when mapping a Row object using a implementation of RowMapper.
RowMapperTypeConversionException Happens when trying to convert a column value of a Row class to a incorrect type.
For example, if the column type is String and you try to convert it to Integer using Row.getInt(String).
UserSessionPersistenceException Happens when there is a problem saving or retrieving the User from a UserSessionPersistence implementation.
 

Package com.appglu Description

The main package of AppGlu's Java Client SDK.
Contain interfaces to describe all available operations and APIs as well as model objects to be used by these operations.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AppGluOperations
